vsParam:
Uh?
It seems everyone is sneezing, [px]?

What's going on?
The flu will spread among people?

Well.
We need to protect ourselves from it...

Whoa!? Wait, don't do this, [px]!
You may have blown me away!!

Alright, forget about that...
Make sure not to get infected.

No! Atishoo...
This... is definitely not... Atishoo! Not any flu!

Oh, Hazel!
The way you sneeze is adorable!

You're... You're so annoying! Atishoo!
Not the time for that! Atishoo! Because——
Now, the whole Academy is facing a crisis!

The Academy.. a crisis!?
Huh? Hey, what's going on!?

Didn't you see? All the senseis, students...
even the guards are sneezing with running noses.

Hmm.
Can't you get a bit serious?

A... tishoo! Actually... The present situation
is all due to some monster... Atishoo!

Huh!?
It's due to some monster!?

Yes.——"Autumn Treant". A tree monster
with scarlet leaves as red as those of the red maple.

If you breathe in the pollen from this monster...
Atishoo! You'll keep sneezing... Atishoo!

I see...
In fact, not everyone in the Academy got the flu...

Exactly. And the biggest problem of the Autumn Treant
is that it keeps running wild regardless of seasons.

Huh!?
If so, we'll always sneeze...

It may last forever. We can't get healed
if we leave that Autumn Treants there!

Our courses will be disrupted if we keep sneezing
like this. Namely!
Now, the Academy... is facing an unprecedented crisis!!!

Oh, sigh~
I can't believe even a sneeze could be that serious...

Yeah! So, [px], Peppermint!
Go wipe out all the Autumn Treants!

That only makes sense.
You're so energetic and you don't sneeze.

Only you could save the Academy from the crisis.
Exactly, you're... the savior of the Academy!

OK, let's go wipe out the Autumn Treants!
"The Autumn Treant Hunt Festival" starts now!!

Sigh...
I feel that we're put on the spot...

Forget it, we can't just let people keep sneezing.
Let's give it a try, [px]!

The quest of Autumn Treant hunt
could be accepted in the event.

First, kill the Autumn Treants, collect
all the fallen material from the ground and submit it!
